name: c01w24-project-rxvalidators
description: ***By: Emily Ho, Lance Talban, Michelle Zhu, Danny Yang, Renat Hossain, Xing Yu Zhou, Kangjie Wu***

setup.win32: npm run win32-apigateway && npm run win32-authservice && npm run win32-userservice && npm run win32-databasefunctions && npm run win32-frontend && npm run win32-verification
setup.linux: npm run linux-apigateway; npm run linux-authservice; npm run linux-userservice; npm run linux-databasefunctions; npm run linux-frontend; npm run linux-verification

scripts.win32-authservice: cd ./backend/auth_service && python -m venv ./.venv && cd .venv/Scripts && activate && cd ../.. && pip install -r requirements.txt"
scripts.win32-userservice: cd ./backend/user_service && python -m venv ./.venv && cd .venv/Scripts && activate && cd ../.. && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.win32-databasefunctions: cd ./backend/database_functions && python -m venv ./.venv && cd .venv/Scripts && activate && cd ../.. && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.win32-verification: cd ./backend/verification_service && python -m venv ./.venv && cd .venv/Scripts && activate && cd ../.. && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.linux-authservice: cd ./backend/auth_service && python -m venv .venv && bash -c 'source ./.venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt' && bash -c 'source deactivate'
scripts.linux-userservice: cd ./backend/user_service && python -m venv .venv && bash -c 'source ./.venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt' && bash -c 'source deactivate'
scripts.linux-databasefunctions: cd ./backend/database_functions && python -m venv .venv && bash -c 'source ./.venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt' && bash -c 'source deactivate'
scripts.linux-verification: cd ./backend/verification_service && python -m venv .venv && bash -c 'source ./.venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt' && bash -c 'source deactivate'
